channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: $1 trillion in cuts to Medicaid would have a devastating impact on people receiving long-term care. Here’s why.
item.description: These cuts will most affect people who are least able to afford them.

item.title: The Download: tackling tech-facilitated abuse, and opening up AI hardware
item.description: This is today’s edition of The Download, our weekday newsletter that provides a daily dose of what’s going on in the world of technology. Why it’s so ...

item.title: May’s missing inflation is a mystery — and a sign that the Fed will hold off on rate cuts
item.description: The Fed will be less willing to bet that tariff-fueled price increases will be just “transitory.”

item.title: The Interpretable AI playbook: What Anthropic’s research means for your enterprise LLM strategy
item.description: Anthropic is developing “interpretable” AI, where models let us understand what they are thinking and arrive at a particular conclusion.

item.title: Shoppers say they’re ‘not interested’ in Amazon’s longer Prime Day sale
item.description: Could making the 2025 Amazon Prime Day event four days long backfire? Here’s what retail analysts think.

item.title: The quest to defend against tech in intimate partner violence

item.title: Jamie Dimon wants workers in the office. So why is he letting JPMorgan’s European chief work remotely?
item.description: The return-to-office double standard has sparked a conversation online: “Rules for thee but not for me.”

item.title: PrismaX launches with $11M to scale virtual datasets for robotics foundation models
item.description: PrismaX is building a decentralized infrastructure to ensure data diversity and authenticity from a community of contributors. The post PrismaX launch...

item.title: SportsVisio raises $3.2M for AI for sports athletes and fans
item.description: SportsVisio has raised $3.2 million to put the power of advanced AI into the hands of every athlete, coach, and fan.

item.title: Circle Internet’s stock-market surge continues as Senate bill’s passage indicates the federal government is taking stablecoins seriously
item.description: Less than two weeks after IPO, Circle Internet’s market capitalization surpasses nearly half of the S&P 500.

item.title: Qodo teams up with Google Cloud to provide devs with FREE AI code review tools directly within platform
item.description: The goal is to make enterprise-grade code quality solutions accessible to fast-growing startups looking to scale responsibly.

item.title: OpenAI moves forward with GPT-4.5 deprecation in API, triggering developer anguish and confusion
item.description: Despite the strong reaction, OpenAI had in fact already announced the plan to deprecate GPT-4.5 Preview back in April 2025.
